title: India Prime Lending Rate
description: Bank Lending Rate in India remained unchanged at 8.80 percent in November from 8.80 percent in October of 2022. Bank Lending Rate in India averaged 13.18 percent from 1978 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 20 percent in October of 1991 and a record low of 8 percent in July of 2010. In India, the prime lending rate is the average rate of interest charged on loans by five major banks. This page provides - India Prime Lending Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Reserve Bank of India
